meanings.definition: A short, quick movement up and down.
meanings.sent1: The boy made a little bob with his head.
meanings.sent2: The bob of the buoy in the water caught my eye.
meanings.sent3: The bob of the bouncing ball was mesmerizing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The bob of the elevator made my stomach drop.
meanings.sent5: The bob of the yo-yo was perfectly timed.

meanings.definition: A hairstyle in which the hair is cut short and evenly all around.
meanings.sent1: Her bob framed her face beautifully.
meanings.sent2: The bob was a popular choice among the students.
meanings.sent3: The bob swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her bob was like a neat little halo.
meanings.sent5: The bob looked sleek and modern.

meanings.definition: A weight attached to a fishing line.
meanings.sent1: The fisherman attached a heavy bob to his line.
meanings.sent2: The bob helped the bait sink deeper into the water.
meanings.sent3: The bob splashed into the lake, ready for action.
meanings.sent4: The bob danced on the surface of the water.
meanings.sent5: The bob signaled a fish was nibbling.

meanings.definition: To move up and down quickly and repeatedly.
meanings.sent1: The cork bobbed in the water.
meanings.sent2: The boat bobbed gently on the waves.
meanings.sent3: The dancer bobbed up and down to the music.
meanings.sent4: The buoy bobbed in the ocean currents.
meanings.sent5: The balloon bobbed in the sky.

meanings.definition: To cut hair short and evenly all around.
meanings.sent1: She decided to bob her hair for a change.
meanings.sent2: The stylist carefully bobbed her hair.
meanings.sent3: He bobbed his hair before the summer heat arrived.
meanings.sent4: The actress bobbed her hair for a movie role.
meanings.sent5: The barber will bob your hair exactly as you like.
